Impact of PL 115-55
On February 19, 2019, changes went into effect based on
PL 115-55, Veterans Appeals Improvement and Modernization Act of 2017
.
The PL and associated regulatory changes impacted both VAâ€™s duty to assist and duty to notify requirements.
title: M21-1, Part I, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A - Description and General Information on Duty to Notify and Duty to Assist
citation: Part I, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A
